Allen Iverson , who hurt his finger against San Antonio McDyess a week ago, slips on a brace after every game per Doc Riverstors orders. If I didn't wear this brace to keep it straight after every game, there's a chance it Will Solomon get worse and I'll have to get a pin, he said. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , chief executive of Google.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web.''
